URL.type: Indicates a page (or other CreativeWork) for which this thing is the main

description.description: A short description of the item.

additionalType.description:
An additional type for the item, typically used for adding more specific 
Thing,Thing,types from external vocabularies in microdata syntax. This is a 
Thing,Thing,relationship between something and a class that the thing is in. In RDFa 
Thing,Thing,syntax, it is better to use the native RDFa syntax - the 'typeof' attribute 
Thing,Thing,- for multiple types. Schema.org tools may have only weaker understanding 
Thing,Thing,of extra types, in particular those defined externally.

potentialAction.description:
Indicates a potential Action, which describes an idealized action in which 
Thing,Thing,this thing would play an 'object' role.

sameAs.description:
URL of a reference Web page that unambiguously indicates the item's 
Thing,Thing,identity. E.g. the URL of the item's Wikipedia page, Freebase page, or 
Thing,Thing,official website.
